title: When Hunt the underdog bit back with a shock maiden F1 victory
summary: James Hunt and a Hesketh in Holland. It all aligned 50 years ago when the future world champion pulled off one of F1's most unlikely wins at Zandvoort, asMatt Bishoprecounts

qa_pairs.question: Which driver achieved an unexpected victory at the 1975 Dutch Grand Prix?
What was the name of the team that James Hunt drove for during his surprise win at Zandvoort?
In which year did James Hunt win his first Formula 1 race at the Dutch Grand Prix?
